addMember(uint256,address).details: Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, SharedRole or if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId`.

params._finderAddress: keeps track of all contracts within the system based on their interfaceName.
params._startingId: the initial proposal id that the contract will begin incrementing from.
params._timerAddress: Contract that stores the current time in a testing environment. Must be set to 0x0 for production environments that use live time.

executeProposal(uint256,uint256).details: This can be called by any address. Caller is expected to send enough ETH to execute payable transactions.

params.id: unique id for the executed proposal.
params.transactionIndex: unique transaction index for the executed proposal.

returns._0: uint for the current Testable timestamp.

getMember(uint256).details: Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, exclusive role.

returns._0: the address of the current ExclusiveRole member.

getProposal(uint256).details: after a proposal is executed, its data will be zeroed out, except for the request time.

params.id: uniquely identify the identity of the proposal.

returns._0: proposal struct containing transactions[] and requestTime.

holdsRole(uint256,address).details: Reverts if roleId does not correspond to an initialized role.

returns._0: True if `memberToCheck` is a member of `roleId`.
uint256 representing the current number of proposals.

propose((address,uint256,bytes)[]).details: You can create the data portion of each transaction by doing the following: ``` const truffleContractInstance = await TruffleContract.deployed() const data = truffleContractInstance.methods.methodToCall(arg1, arg2).encodeABI() ``` Note: this method must be public because of a solidity limitation that disallows structs arrays to be passed to external functions.

params.transactions: list of transactions that are being proposed.

removeMember(uint256,address).details: Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, SharedRole or if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId`.

params.memberToRemove: the current SharedRole member to remove.

renounceMembership(uint256).details: Reverts if the caller is not a member of the role for `roleId` or if `roleId` is not an initialized, SharedRole.

resetMember(uint256,address).details: Reverts if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId` or if `roleId` is not an initialized, ExclusiveRole.

setCurrentTime(uint256).details: Will revert if not running in test mode.

params.time: timestamp to set current Testable time to.

devdoc.title: Takes proposals for certain governance actions and allows UMA token holders to vote on them.

executeProposal(uint256,uint256).notice: Executes a proposed governance action that has been approved by voters.

getCurrentTime().notice: Gets the current time. Will return the last time set in `setCurrentTime` if running in test mode. Otherwise, it will return the block timestamp.

getMember(uint256).notice: Gets the current holder of the exclusive role, `roleId`.

getProposal(uint256).notice: Gets the proposal data for a particular id.

holdsRole(uint256,address).notice: Whether `memberToCheck` is a member of roleId.

numProposals().notice: Gets the total number of proposals (includes executed and non-executed).

propose((address,uint256,bytes)[]).notice: Proposes a new governance action. Can only be called by the holder of the Proposer role.

resetMember(uint256,address).notice: Changes the exclusive role holder of `roleId` to `newMember`.
